## AI Writer for all your content writing needs

Whether you are a blogger, digital marketeer, journalist, student, story-
teller, or just composing emails or social media posts, Sassbook AI Writer
helps get the right words out.

Rapidly generate unique, original content based on your own prompts to produce
well-written content that stands out. Regardless of your skill level, this AI
writer app will serve you well.

AI writer for diverse content generation

## Say goodbye to writer's block with automatic text generation

Just start writing, tweak AI generated text and build up your content. No more
staring at blank screens! You may even be surprised or be inspired by what the
AI writer comes up with.

The AI text generator will not only speed up your content creation, but will
also help generate articulate, original content often spurring new ideas
driven by AI.

Inspiring automatic text generator

## AI writer powered by state-of-the-art natural language technologies

Sassbook AI article writer is powered by modern AI, which produces original
content, based on what it has learned from what is out there in the wild.

Generate content rapidly in a wide variety of styles with this AI content
generator leveraging state-of-the-art AI.

Powerful AI article writer

##### Learn more about Sassbook AI Text Writer    Learn More

##### Impatient? Watch this short video (39 seconds) to get started quickly.

##### Check out our commercial plans \- Up to **100** words with **6**
candidate generations at a time and with creativity control - all apps
included.

##### For more details, see: AI writer examples and tips on Sassbook AI blog

##### For a specialized AI story generator: Check out: Sassbook AI Story
Writer

##### Automatically generate human-like text summaries with AI: Check out:
Sassbook AI Summarizer

##### To paraphrase and rephrase text for any purpose: Check out: Sassbook AI
Paraphraser

##### Assign awesome titles, headlines, or taglines to your content using the
Sassbook AI Headline Generator!

# Sassbook AI Pricing FAQ

1\. Which products are included in the subscription pricing?

The AI Writer, the AI Story Writer, the AI Summarizer, AI Paraphraser, and the
AI Headline Generator are included.The products cannot be subscribed
separately at this time.

In addition, each plan includes monthly Developer API credit for a generous
amount of API usage. Any new products added might be included as well.

2\. Are prices shown per user/seat?

Yes, pricing is per user/seat. You can add more users in the checkout page
when you subscribe or from the Account page anytime after subscribing to a
plan.

3\. Can I upgrade from one plan to another?

Yes, you can upgrade from Standard to Premium plan and/or from monthly to
yearly anytime from the account page.

Any unused time in your subscription will be pro-rated, with the details shown
clearly in the checkout page.

4\. Are annual subscriptions protected against price increases?

Yes, if prices increase and new products become available, you will continue
to enjoy the same pricing until the next billing cycle, whether annual or
monthly. Of course, annual subscriptions offer much more savings in this
scenario, being discounted already.

5\. Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel whenever you wish and you will not be charged again. You
can continue to use the applications until the end of the current billing
cycle.

However, no refunds will be issued. If you want to try out the service, the
free plan does not require a credit card.

6\. Can I upgrade anytime?

Yes, you can upgrade your existing plan to a higher tier or from monthly to
yearly anytime from the Account page.

However, of you wish to downgrade a plan, please contact us. You can only
downgrade an yearly or monthly plan at the end of the current billing cycle.

7\. Do prices shown include taxes?

No, all prices shown are **exclusive** of taxes. Depending on your location,
taxes will be applied during checkout and reflected in the total amount to be
paid.

8\. I am business user with VAT/GST tax number responsible for my own taxes.
Is this supported?

Yes, reverse charging is supported. The checkout page has provision for
entering this number. We try to validate this at the time of payment where
possible (such as for EU countries).

If the validation fails or is inconclusive, we will apply taxes. However, this
can be refunded when verified later.

Contact Support if there are any questions or discrepancies.

9\. Are there discounts for academic/non-profits and volume discounts?

Yes, we do offer discounts for verified academic and non-profit users.

For multi-user licenses larger than five users, we do offer additional
discounts.

Contact Support to make use of these offers.

10\. Do you offer refunds?

No, we do not refund subscriptions. However, you can cancel anytime and
continue to use it until the end of the current billing cycle (whether monthly
or annual).
